<h2>Our Brief Overview</h2>

<p>

Stat Devs is a data analytics company aiming to enhance <b style="color:#2a5f7a;"><i>data driven culture and skills</b></i> for businesses and academia focusing on fast evolving fields in <b style="color:#2a5f7a;"><i>Data Science, Statistics</b></i> and <b style="color:#2a5f7a;"><i>Data Visualization.</b></i>

Through data analytics and research, our aim is to assist businesses in data driven decisions. From climate change to day to day to business decisions, the need for reliable and robust metrics is needed to <b style="color:#2a5f7a;"><i>optimize</b></i> business processes, <b style="color:#2a5f7a;"><i>identify</i></b> production and supply bottlenecks, <b style="color:#2a5f7a;"><i>analyze</i></b> customer buying trends and to help businesses make strategically guided <b style="color:#2a5f7a;"><i>decisions.</i></b>

We are a passionate team of <b style="color:#2a5f7a;"><i>Data Analysts & Data Scientists</i></b> aiming to solve your business problems through data analytics and automation. Our team consists of consultants from diverse backgrounds working on complex business problems. Our dedicated team is committed to research and development of analytical workflows in <b style="color:#2a5f7a;"><i>business</i></b> and <b style="color:#2a5f7a;"><i>academic</i></b> domains.

We believe that by taking small and timely actions, businesses can make a substantive difference in <b style="color:#2a5f7a;"><i>quality, delivery and costs reduction</i></b>. By adopting data driven approaches and culture, Stat Devs aims to empower businesses by data technology, improve business processes and help them set data driven metrics to <b style="color:#2a5f7a;"><i>measure, monitor and optimize</i></b> business processes.

</p>
